mapper.select: select ask_admin_id, ask_admin_title, ask_admin_content, ask_admin_register_date, aa.member_id, member_nickname, ask_admin_status from tbl_ask_admin aa join tbl_member m on aa.member_id = m.member_id where aa.ask_admin_status = 0 order by aa.ask_admin_id desc

select aa.ask_admin_id, aa.ask_admin_title, aa.ask_admin_content, aa.ask_admin_register_date, aa.member_id, m.member_nickname, aa.ask_admin_status from tbl_ask_admin aa join tbl_member m on aa.member_id = m.member_id order by aa.ask_admin_id desc limit #{amount} offset #{offset}

select aa.ask_admin_id, aa.ask_admin_title, aa.ask_admin_content, aa.ask_admin_register_date, aa.member_id, m.member_nickname, aa.ask_admin_status from tbl_ask_admin aa join tbl_member m on aa.member_id = m.member_id order by aa.ask_admin_id desc limit 5
select count(distinct ask_admin_id) countTotalAsks from tbl_ask_admin
select count(distinct ask_admin_id) countAnswerWaitAsks from tbl_ask_admin where ask_admin_status = 0
